name: WorMaze
description:
You are a magical creature similar to a worm who got into an ancient labyrinth and you have to get out of it! You can slide left and right with the  keys :

A and D or <- and ->. 

You must escape the maze and not stop otherwise you will die! You can get stuck in a trap, enemy  or stop due to simple or moving walls!

Please rate my game!

Credits: Shaders https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/ultimate-10-shaders-168611

Audio:https://soundcloud.com/zomo-bie

This game created for Insiders Game Jam!
